emailTemplates.description: This email is sent when the organization admin reinitiates password reset for a user
This email notifies the user that password reset is successfully completed
This email notifies the user that the organization admin has requested a password reset.
This email notifies the user that a login from a new device is detected
This email notifies the user that their account is unlocked by the organization admin
This email is used to request the user to confirm their email address for the new account
This email is sent when the user has requested a password reset
This email is sent to request a password from the user when the new account is created
This email notifies the user that their account is now unlocked (Time-Based)
This email sends the Magic Link to the user
This email notifies the user that the account is locked by the organization admin
This email notifies the user that the account is locked by due to too many failed login attempts
This email notifies the user that the account is now enabled
This email is used to re-send the notification to confirm user's email address
This email resends the Email OTP to a user
This email sends the Email OTP to a user
This email informs the user that the email address is updated
This email informs the user that the email address is updated
This email sends an Email OTP to a user for password reset
This email resends an Email OTP to a user for password reset
This email is sent to request credentials from the user when a new account is created and the registration flow is incomplete
This email is resent to request credentials from the user when a new account is created and the registration flow is incomplete

smsTemplates.description: This SMS is sent when a user registers and needs to confirm their account.
This SMS is sent when a user requests to recover their username.
This SMS is sent to notify the user of a successful password reset.
This SMS is sent when a user initiates a password reset.
This SMS is sent when a user requests to resend the OTP for password reset.
This SMS is sent to provide a one-time password for verification.
This SMS is sent to verify the user's mobile number after an update.
This SMS is sent to provide a one-time password when admin initiates a password reset for a user
This SMS is sent to provide a one-time password when admin resends a password reset request
